column4: hello I'm looking for some help with ubuntu and Firefox - firefox keeps graying out when you open it
maybe try disabling it and see if it still happens
have  you installed the restricted drivers for the video card?  any updates done lately?
maybe try the restricted drivers or the drivers from ati
stepram you've got a slightly better system then me so not sure why the lag
thanks for trying it just freezes now and again, Compiz still works and and when I check top Firefox is using 100% on one processor and 2gb ram!
what kinds of pages are you on when it seems to freeze?
, can be anything, normally freezes on homepage, which is the mozila page, since in re-installed it
ok, something sounds screwy with ff then
yeh some of the guys i work with suggested removing java because it doesn't work well with x64???
java used to be a sore spot but it seems to be fine now
my java is still screwed cant get simplehelp to work on it, have to use IE6 on wine !
did it earlier but still froze, just used the package manager, no change, only plug ins are flash player and google toolbar
thanks will try that tonight, time to head home for me, thanks for your help.
